import React, {useState} from 'react' import { ProductList } from './ProductList' import SideBar from './SideBar' import "./SearchCategory.css" export const PageContent = () => { const [productCount, setProductCount] = useState(); const [showBox, setShowBox] = useState(true); const [showList, setShowList] = useState(false); const updateName = (count: number):void => { setProductCount(count) } const clickEvent1 = ():void => { console.log("clicked") setShowList(false) setShowBox(true) console.log({showBox}) } const clickEvent2 = ():void => { console.log("clicked list") setShowBox(false) setShowList(true) console.log({showList}) } return (
Products ({productCount} products)
Buy
) } export default PageContent
